name: Untangled (Tiago Videira)
description:
Global Game Jam 2023 page
You control the roots! Don't let them get tangled. Control two roots with the left and right thumbstick from your controller, and attack the enemies with the back triggers(L2 & R2).

Team:

Tiago Videira- Gameplay & UI Programmer
David Magalhães- Character and UI Artist
João Pereira- UI Programmer
José Lopes- Visual Artist
Renato Cruz- Music Producer
